update.description:
Add iw, yi.org dyndns provider.
Upgrade apache to 2.2.15, bash-4.0 to patch level 37, dhcpcd to 5.2.1, diffutils to 2.9, dnsmasq to 2.52, fcron to 3.0.5, gmp to 5.0.1, iptables to 1.4.7, openldap to 2.4.19, openssl to 0.9.8m, openssh to 5.4, popt to 1.15, rsyslog to 4.6.1, syslinux to 3.8.5, util-linux-ng to 2.17.1.
Use a more recent popt lib and relink logrotate.
